transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+3% Ally Team Effectiveness
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+3% Ally Team Effectiveness
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Dormouse Whiskers
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to increase <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000020_1_1]</color> chance to increase <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000020_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Hatter's Teacup
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: When using this skill, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from all enemies, then attacks them.\nAfter attacking, inflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Effectiveness</color> for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color> on all enemies and increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>25%</color> for every target that was inflicted damage.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Increases damage\nReduces Alice in Wonderland Cooldown by 1 turn

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changed to Enhanced Skill\nResets Alice In Wonderland! Cooldown

description: When using this skill, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000020_2_3]</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000020_2_3]</color> <color=#28d9ed>buff(s)</color> from all enemies, then attacks them.\nAfter attacking, inflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Effectiveness</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000020_2_4] turn(s)</color> on all enemies and increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000020_2_2]</color> for every target that was inflicted damage.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Alice In Wonderland
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: Attacks all enemies and has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000020_3_1]</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000020_3_1] turn(s)</color>.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, removes <color=#28d9ed>1 buff(s)</color> from all enemies.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to increase <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, removes <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000020_chain_1_1] buff(s)</color> from all enemies.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000020_backup_1_1]</color> chance to increase <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000020_backup_1_1] turn(s)</color>.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
